author: andreas
content:
What's the problem with capturing a clichÃ©? Sometimes it is unavoidable, sometimes it just happens, and in those places it is certainly harder to get at unseen views than anywhere else. I wouldn't care. Most people are afraid of converging lines and non-level horizons, that would eliminate 90% anyway ðŸ™‚

Sorry, I have no remedy. Just go and shoot and be happy shooting. I'm confident you'll manage to be recognizable anyway. You always manage to be.

Andreas
